sentences.sContent: The top layer should now point down to the layer beneath.
sentences.sContent_eng: The top layer should now point down to the layer beneath.
sentences.sCn: 现在，顶部图层应当有小箭头指向下面的图层。

sentences.sContent: They must all be drowning beneath him, in the watery caves of the rock!
sentences.sContent_eng: They must all be drowning beneath him, in the watery caves of the rock!
sentences.sCn: 他们一定是在他下面的水里，就在那岩石充满了水的洞中游泳了！

sentences.sContent: ...places have been found on earth that are in total blackness such as caves several miles beneath the ocean...

remMethod.val: be(表加强) ＋ neath(在…之下) → 在…下方
